name: github-mathml
description: iA Writer template with support for Math
author: Jonas Hermsmeier <jhermsmeier@gmail.com> (https://jhermsmeier.de)

scripts.iatemplate: rm -r github-mathml.iatemplate; mkdir -p github-mathml.iatemplate; cp -r ./Contents github-mathml.iatemplate/
scripts.zip: rm GitHub-MathML.zip; zip -r -9 GitHub-MathML.zip github-mathml.iatemplate/ -x github-mathml.iatemplate/**/.DS_Store
scripts.bundle: npm run iatemplate; npm run zip
